author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamil Nadu Foodgrains Merchants Association has strongly objected to the announcement of the Union Finance Minister, Arun Jaitley, in the budget on allowing foreign direct investment in marketing of food products.

In a statement issued here on Tuesday, president of the association S. P. Jeyapragasam said that the move would affect the livelihood of farmers and food business operators.
title: FDI in food business opposed
